attributes.action: Decree censorship of the media on reporting acts of terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Terrorism in the 21st century is being paraded all over the media and therefore inducing fear and creating the desired effect for such acts. If the media was censored so terrorist attacks were only briefly covered in the media and not exaggerated, their campaigns would be less effective and they would have to find new ways to publicise and make others aware of their ideas.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
